plot outline: Mohacheppu is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P Chandrashekar and produced by Sincere Cine Arts. The film stars Sharmilee and Mariya lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Rajeev.
title: Mohacheppu
plot: _Mohacheppu_ (qv) is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P Chandrashekar and produced by Sincere Cine Arts. The film stars Sharmilee and Mariya lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Rajeev.
